data.eml:eml: Holorchis castex n. sp. (Digenea: Lepocreadiidae) from the painted sweet-lips Diagramma pictum (Thunberg, 1792) (Perciformes: Haemulidae) from New Caledonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bray, Rodney A., Justine, Jean-Lou (2007): Holorchis castex n. sp. (Digenea: Lepocreadiidae) from the painted sweet-lips Diagramma pictum (Thunberg, 1792) (Perciformes: Haemulidae) from New Caledonia. Zootaxa 1426: 51-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175744
